3.0.0: Now uses electron as a backend
Stores your playlist data on Firebase instead
Has an accompanying mobile remote control
Added reload functionality for music view to counteract youtube randomly speeding it up or slowing it down
3.0.1: Added the ability to open dev tools
3.0.2: Events are no longer counted twice
3.0.3: Waits for CSS to load longer
Searches for available ports in case the default one can't be used
3.0.5: Ensures the same command isn't interpreted twice
3.0.6: Shows a tagline with the version number beneath the spinner
Shows a toast when the port is different
3.0.7: Added delay before executing youtube video scripts
3.0.9: Can launch with the Shift+Alt+L shortcut
Hides loading spinner when you have to log in on the youtubeSubs view
3.0.10: Launches the app when any command is triggered and it's not yet launched
3.0.12: Pressing remote buttons launches the app if it isn't running yet
Added fallback font on remote for if Roboto isn't supported (Segoe UI)
Queues logs/toasts until the window is active
3.0.13: Fixed a bunch of bugs in the youtubeSearch view
Auto restarts if the window hasn't launched yet and it has to restart
Shows more notifications instead of dialogs (when possible)
3.0.14: Added the ability to free up memory through the command bar
Also navs to youtu.be links when pasted
3.0.17: Volume bar changes delta at lower volumes
3.0.18: Ads can now be added by the user and are auto-updated
Moved settings to its own shared (with secrets) file
Won't throw an error when widevine can't be found
Added shutdown and start server commands to command bar
Server reboots when unexpectedly shutdown and won't crash app
Checking for updates is a setting now and can be done from the tray icon
